Title: The Satin Slipper
Writer: Paul Claudel (text by), Manoel de Oliveira (adaptation)
Actors: Luís Miguel Cintra, Patricia Barzyk, Anne Consigny, Anne Gautier
Plot: During the century of the Spanish Gold, Doña Prouhèze, wife of a nobleman, deeply loves Don Rodrigo, who is forced to leave Spain and go to America. Meanwhile Prouhèze is sent to Africa to ...
